title: This Small Finance Bank Makes Interest Rate Revision On FD (W.e.f. 18/04/2022) - Goodreturns
content: This Small Finance Bank Makes Interest Rate Revision On FD (W.e.f. 18/04/2022)  Goodreturns
description: The interest rate on fixed deposits of less than Rs 2 crore has been revised by ESAF Small Finance Bank, a DICGC-insured bank. The interest rate change has been implemented today, April 18th, 2022, and the new interest rates apply to new Resident term deposits as well as renewals of existing Resident term deposits and recurring deposits.
